attributes.action: ask the English FA to hire Jose Mourinho as swiftly as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The success of the England team is a source of national pride and is known to affect the economy and morale of the English people.

We are able to vote for the best available candidate to the run Britain and we should be able to voice our opinion on the best candidate for the England football coach/managers job.

Jose Mourinho is the exceptional candidate for the following reasons:

He has a proven track record having won all major club honours in this country and in Europe.  This includes an exceptional cup record.

He has already worked with some of the top England players and has managed other players of similar stature at club level.

He speaks English fluently and deals with the press in a way that is both entertaining and easy to understand.

He shows clear determination, drive and a will to win which would be useful in the face of inevitable adversity in the England job.


By signing this petition you are showing your support for Jose Mourinho as new England coach.  It is a matter of national interest so you should have your say.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
